00016 Cell::Cell(int _ID, std::vector<ngl::Vec3> _fourCorners, std::vector<int> _neighbourCellIDs,
00017            std::vector<int> _perpendicularCellIDs)
00018 {
00019   // Checks there are 4 elements to the four corners parameter.
00020     if ( _fourCorners.size() == 4)
00021     {
00022     //Copy parameter into the member m_fourCorners:
00023     m_fourCorners = _fourCorners;
00024     //Set the bounds to the first element in _fourCorners,
00025     // this will be tested against later to find the correct bounds.
00026     float upper = _fourCorners[0].m_z,
00027           lower = _fourCorners[0].m_z,
00028           left = _fourCorners[0].m_x,
00029           right = _fourCorners[0].m_x;
00030     //For loop that compares each of the bounds to the elements of _fourCorners
00031     // and assigns the correct bounds accordingly:
00032       for (unsigned int i=0; i<4 ;i++)
00033       {
00034           if (upper> _fourCorners[i].m_z)
00035           {
00036               upper= _fourCorners[i].m_z;
00037           }
00038           if (lower< _fourCorners[i].m_z)
00039           {
00040               lower= _fourCorners[i].m_z;
00041           }
00042           if (left> _fourCorners[i].m_x)
00043           {
00044               left= _fourCorners[i].m_x;
00045           }
00046           if (right< _fourCorners[i].m_x)
00047           {
00048               right= _fourCorners[i].m_x;
00049           }
00050     }
00051 
00052     //m_boundaries are set accordingly:
00053     m_boundries.m_x = upper;
00054     m_boundries.m_y = lower;
00055     m_boundries.m_z = left;
00056     m_boundries.m_w = right;
00057 
00058     //Derrive m_centre from boundaries:
00059     m_centre.m_x = ((right+left)/2.0);
00060     m_centre.m_y = 0;
00061     m_centre.m_z = ((upper+lower)/2.0);
00062 
00063     //Set cell ID, neighbours and perpendicular neighbours:
00064     m_ID = _ID;
00065     m_neighbourCellIDs = _neighbourCellIDs;
00066     m_perpendicularNeighbourCellIDs = _perpendicularCellIDs;
00067     }
00068 
00069     else
00070     {
00071         std::cout<<" fourCorners does not have 4 corners!!"<<std::endl;
00072     }
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 }
